name: Helios Technologies, Inc.
description: Helios Technologies, Inc. is a leading global provider of innovative solutions in the hydraulics and electronics sectors. Founded in 1984 and headquartered in Sarasota, Florida, Helios specializes in designing and manufacturing a wide range of products that enhance the performance and efficiency of mobile and industrial equipment. The company operates through two primary segments: Hydraulics and Electronics. The Hydraulics segment offers products such as pumps, motors, valves, and hydraulic systems, which are utilized in diverse applications including construction, agriculture, and material handling. The Electronics segment develops advanced electronic controls and systems that optimize hydraulic performance, contributing to improved productivity and operational efficiency. Helios is committed to sustainability and aims to reduce energy consumption and emissions through its innovative technologies. The company has a strong global presence, serving customers in over 100 countries, and is known for its focus on quality, reliability, and customer service. With continuous investment in research and development, Helios Technologies strives to drive technological advancements in the hydraulic and electronic industries, positioning itself as a leader in these sectors.
